title: Trust.Assign.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Trust.Assign capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the org, agent, or system profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

agent_ref.description: Reference to the agent being evaluated for trust assignment.

evidence.description: List of evidence items used to compute trust.

context.description: Optional contextual information (e.g., authentication event, risk signals).
